$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/styles
$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/change-input-tab
$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus.text:
\whitespace trim

\define change-input-tab(stateTitle,tag,beforeafter,defaultState,actions)
\whitespace trim
<$set name="tabsList" filter="[enlist<explicitTabList>] ~[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag<__tag__>!has[draft.of]]">
	<$let
		currentState={{{ [<__stateTitle__>!is[missing]get[text]] ~[<__defaultState__>] }}}
		firstTab={{{ [enlist<tabsList>nth[1]] }}}
		lastTab={{{ [enlist<tabsList>last[]] }}}
		nextTab={{{ [enlist<tabsList>$beforeafter$<currentState>] ~[[$beforeafter$]removeprefix[after]suffix[]addprefix<firstTab>] ~[[$beforeafter$]removeprefix[before]suffix[]addprefix<lastTab>] }}}
	>
		<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<__stateTitle__>> text=<<nextTab>>/>
		$actions$
	</$let>
</$set>
\end

\define set-next-input-tab(beforeafter:"after")
<$macrocall $name="change-input-tab"
	stateTitle="$:/state/tab--1498284803"
	beforeafter="$beforeafter$"
	defaultState="$:/plugins/wikilabs/ui/AdvancedSearchPlus/System"
	actions="<$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/state/advancedsearch/currentTab' text=<<nextTab>>/>"/>
\end

$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/history
$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus.text:
V 0.6.0 - 2023-01-01

* This version starts to overwrite $:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Basics
* Catch navigateTo link from $:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Basics
* set tiddler: $:/state/tab--1498284803 to "$:/plugins/wikilabs/ui/AdvancedSearchPlus/Filter
** This allows the eg: "Number of overridden shadow tiddlers" to change the AdvancedSearch Tab in the right way
* compatible with v5.2.7

V 0.5.0 - 2023-01-30

* add language-hint to tab icon and caption
* clear the caption temp tiddler when enter is cliced
* fix close `<<expandMe>>` state, when enter is clicked
* use most core advanced search tiddlers instead of overwriting them
* add keyboard ctrl-alt left/right

V 0.4.0 - 2023-01-01

* add CTRL-Enter to create a new search tab
* fix standard search-template to work with latest TW version
* fix automatic tab-switching problems
* improved code readabilty
* improved new search-tab UI
* update copyright info
* new shadow search icon
* update to TW version v5.2.5

V 0.3.0 - 2022-03-27

* Update to TW version v5.2.2
* remove tiddler info button from view template
* change license to CC-BY-NC-SA

V 0.2.0 - 2021-03-07

* make plugin compatible with TW V5.1.23
* make plugin compatible with field-search plugin V0.3.0

V 0.1.2 - 2020-12-25

* update license

V 0.1.1 - 2020.01.19

* Update license link/text

V 0.1.0 - beta 2019.01.06

* fix wikify problems with TW 5.1.19

V 0.0.2 - beta

* initial release
** name: advanced-search-plus

$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/license
$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus.text:
[[Advanced Search Plus|https://wikilabs.github.io/#advanced-search-plus]] (c) Mario Pietsch - 2016-2023

$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/readme
$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus.text:
* Important: ''No browser reload'' needed * Change the default "Advanced Search" tiddler * Adds the "Advanced Search" tab to the right sidebar * Replaces the default search option with an icon * Adds a "new search tab" button to the advanced search function * Allows to pin existing search settings to a new tab ---- ''Important'': This plugin modifies several core templates
    <$list filter="[[$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus]plugintiddlers[]prefix[$:/core/]] $:/AdvancedSearch">
  • <$link to=<>><>

$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/menu
$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus.caption: {{$:/core/images/advanced-search-button}}
$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus.text: {{$:/AdvancedSearch}}

$:/plugins/wikilabs/ui/AdvancedSearchPlu.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/ui/AdvancedSearchPlus/Devider
$:/plugins/wikilabs/ui/AdvancedSearchPlu.text:
TODO - see: [[timeline-subfilter-days]]

* I want to have a dropdown with some useful timeline macros.
* useful TOC macro settings ... 

<!--<explicitTabList>-->

The following input is only there, so eg: CTRL-ALT-left keyboard navigation works

<$keyboard key="((input-tab-right))" actions=<<set-next-input-tab>>>
<$keyboard key="((input-tab-left))" actions=<<set-next-input-tab "before">>>

<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/asp/devider" tag=input focus=yes/>

</$keyboard>
</$keyboard>

$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/expand-me-macro
$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus.text:
\define expandMe(tiddler pre="" showText:"Show me" hideText:"Hide me" showTooltip:"show" hideTooltip:"hide" showButtonText hideButtonText)
\whitespace trim
<$reveal type="nomatch" state={{{ "$:/state/expandMe/" [<__pre__>] [<__tiddler__>] +[join[]] }}} text="show">
	<$button set={{{ "$:/state/expandMe/" [<__pre__>] [<__tiddler__>] +[join[]] }}}
			setTo="show" tooltip=<<__showTooltip__>> class="tc-small-gap-right" >
		<<__showText__>>
	</$button> <<__showButtonText__>>
</$reveal>
<$reveal state={{{ "$:/state/expandMe/" [<__pre__>] [<__tiddler__>] +[join[]] }}}
		type="match" text="show">
	<$button set={{{ "$:/state/expandMe/" [<__pre__>] [<__tiddler__>] +[join[]] }}}
			setTo="hide" tooltip=<<__hideTooltip__>> class="tc-small-gap-right">
		<<__hideText__>>
	</$button> <<__hideButtonText__>>
	<$transclude tiddler=<<__tiddler__>> mode=block/>
</$reveal>
\end

$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/filter-search-plus-new
$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/filter-search-plus
$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus.text:
\define new-tiddler-input() $:/temp/asp/input/filter

\define add-tab-actions()
<$let input-tiddler={{{ "$:/search-flt/" "inp/" [<new-tiddler-input>get[text]] +[join[]] }}}
		search-title={{{ "$:/search-flt/" [<new-tiddler-input>get[text]] +[join[]] }}}>
	<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/state/expandMe/$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/filter-search-plus"/>
	<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/tab-54561037" text=<<search-title>>/>
	<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/tab--1498284803" text=<<search-title>> />
	<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<input-tiddler>> text={{$:/temp/advancedsearch}} />
	<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<search-title>>
		caption={{{ [<new-tiddler-input>get[text]] }}}
		hint={{{ [<currentTab>get[hint]] }}}
		input-title=<<search-title>>
		input-tiddler=<<input-tiddler>>
		text={{$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/FilterSearchTemplate}}
		tags="$:/tags/AdvancedSearchPlus"
		icon="$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/filter-search.svg"
	/>
	<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<<new-tiddler-input>>/>
</$let>
\end

\whitespace trim
<$keyboard actions=<<add-tab-actions>> key="ctrl-enter">
	<$edit-text field="text" tag="input" class="wikilabs-full-width" 
		tiddler=<<new-tiddler-input>>
		placeholder="caption"
		focus="yes"/>
</$keyboard>
<$button class="tc-tiny-gap-left" tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Clear/Caption}} >
	<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<<new-tiddler-input>>/>
	<$transclude tiddler="$:/core/images/cancel-button" />
</$button>
<$button actions=<<add-tab-actions>> class="tc-tiny-gap-left" tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/NewTiddler/Caption}} >
	<$transclude tiddler="$:/core/images/done-button" />
</$button>

$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/shadow-search-plus-new
$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus.text:

    showText:{{$:/core/images/unfold-button}}
    hideText:{{$:/core/images/fold-button}}
    showTooltip:"Create a new SHADOW search tab"
    hideButtonText:"New Shadow Tab">>

$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/FilterSearchTemplate
$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus.text:
\define lingo-base() $:/language/Search/ <$tiddler tiddler=<>> <$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Delete/Caption}} > <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler={{!!input-tiddler}}/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler={{!!input-title}}/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/state/tab--1498284803"/> <$transclude tiddler="$:/core/images/delete-button" /> <>
<$reveal state={{!!input-tiddler}} type="nomatch" text=""> <$set name="search-term" tiddler={{!!input-tiddler}}> <$macrocall $name="exportButton" exportFilter=<> lingoBase="$:/language/Buttons/ExportTiddlers/"/> <$button popup=<> class="tc-btn-invisible"> {{$:/core/images/down-arrow}} <$reveal state=<> type="popup" position="below" animate="yes" class="tc-block-dropdown tc-edit-type-dropdown"> <$linkcatcher to={{!!input-tiddler}}> <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/Filter]]"><$link to={{!!filter}}><$transclude field="description"/> <$keyboard key="((input-tab-right))" actions=<>> <$keyboard key="((input-tab-left))" actions=<>> <$edit-text tiddler={{!!input-tiddler}} type="search" tag="input" focus="yes"/> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <$action-setfield $tiddler={{!!input-tiddler}} $field="text" $value=""/> {{$:/core/images/close-button}} <$reveal state={{!!input-tiddler}} type="nomatch" text=""> <$set name="search-term" tiddler={{!!input-tiddler}}> <$set name="resultCount" value="<$count filter=<>/>">
<> <$list filter=<> template="$:/core/ui/ListItemTemplate"/>

$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/ShadowSearchTemplate
$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus.text:
\define lingo-base() $:/language/Search/ <$tiddler tiddler=<>> <$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Delete/Caption}} > <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler={{!!input-tiddler}}/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler={{!!input-title}}/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/state/tab--1498284803"/> <$transclude tiddler="$:/core/images/delete-button" /> <>
<$keyboard key="((input-tab-right))" actions=<>> <$keyboard key="((input-tab-left))" actions=<>> <$edit-text tiddler={{!!input-tiddler}} type="search" tag="input" placeholder="..." default="" focus="yes"/> <$reveal state={{!!input-tiddler}} type="nomatch" text=""> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <$action-setfield $tiddler={{!!input-tiddler}} $field="text" $value=""/> {{$:/core/images/close-button}}
<$reveal state={{!!input-tiddler}} type="nomatch" text=""> <$set name="search-term" tiddler={{!!input-tiddler}}> <$set name="resultCount" value="<$count filter='[all[shadows]search]'/>">
<> <$list filter="[all[shadows]searchsort[title]limit[250]]" template="$:/core/ui/ListItemTemplate"/>
<$reveal state={{!!input-tiddler}} type="match" text="">

$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/StandardSearchTemplate-emptyMessage
$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus.text:
<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/SearchResults]!has[draft.of]]">
<$transclude/>
</$list>

$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/StandardSearchTemplate
$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus.text:
\define lingo-base() $:/language/Search/ <$tiddler tiddler=<>> <$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Delete/Caption}} > <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler={{!!input-tiddler}}/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler={{!!input-title}}/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/state/tab--1498284803"/> <$transclude tiddler="$:/core/images/delete-button" /> <>
<$keyboard key="((input-tab-right))" actions=<>> <$keyboard key="((input-tab-left))" actions=<>> <$edit-text tiddler={{!!input-tiddler}} type="search" tag="input" placeholder="..." default="" focus="yes"/> <$reveal state={{!!input-tiddler}} type="nomatch" text=""> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <$action-setfield $tiddler={{!!input-tiddler}} $field="text" $value=""/> {{$:/core/images/close-button}}
<$reveal state={{!!input-tiddler}} type="nomatch" text=""> <$let userInput={{{ [{!!input-tiddler}get[text]] }}} configTiddler={{$:/config/SearchResults/Default}}> <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/SearchResults]!has[draft.of]butfirst[]limit[1]]" emptyMessage={{$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/StandardSearchTemplate-emptyMessage}} > <$macrocall $name="tabs" tabsList="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/SearchResults]!has[draft.of]]" default={{$:/config/SearchResults/Default}}/>

$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus.title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus/SystemSearchTemplate
$:/plugins/wikilabs/advanced-search-plus.text:
\define lingo-base() $:/language/Search/ <$tiddler tiddler=<>> <$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Delete/Caption}} > <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler={{!!input-tiddler}}/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler={{!!input-title}}/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/state/tab--1498284803"/> <$transclude tiddler="$:/core/images/delete-button" /> <>
<$keyboard key="((input-tab-right))" actions=<>> <$keyboard key="((input-tab-left))" actions=<>> <$edit-text tiddler={{!!input-tiddler}} type="search" tag="input" placeholder="..." default="" focus="yes"/> <$reveal state={{!!input-tiddler}} type="nomatch" text=""> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <$action-setfield $tiddler={{!!input-tiddler}} $field="text" $value=""/> {{$:/core/images/close-button}}
<$reveal state={{!!input-tiddler}} type="nomatch" text=""> <$set name="search-term" tiddler={{!!input-tiddler}}> <$set name="resultCount" value="<$count filter='[is[system]search]'/>">
<> <$list filter="[is[system]searchsort[title]limit[250]]" template="$:/core/ui/ListItemTemplate"/>
<$reveal state={{!!input-tiddler}} type="match" text="">
